title: Fix issues with buffer samples
body:
**Description of Change**

Fix issues with buffer samples.

**Bugs Fixed**

- Fixes #1087

**API Changes**

None.

**Behavioral Changes**

Fix issues where the current buffer is not actually set up for the max samples.

**PR Checklist**

- [ ] Has tests (if omitted, state reason in description)
- [ ] Rebased on top of master at time of PR
- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation
